string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: “The trouble is, you think you have time.”
“The goal to strive for is a poor government but rich people.”
“Loneliness is the universal problem of rich people.”
“Rich people in one country don\'t act the same as rich people in another country.”
“A man is rich in proportion to the number of things which he can afford to let alone.”
“Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world… if you do so, you are insulting yourself.”
“Do your duty and a little more and the future will care for itself.”
“Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.”
“Many of life\'s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.”
“Do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Let the day\'s own trouble be sufficient for the day.”
“It’s terrible to become rich and to know nothing else.”
“He swallows riches, But will vomit them up; God will expel them from his belly.”
“I\'ve been rich and I\'ve been poor. It\'s better to be rich.”
“The beauty of me is that I’m very rich.”
“Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn’t matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we’ve done something wonderful...that’s what matters to me.”
“It is better to live rich than to die rich.”
“Capital, created by the labor of the worker, crushes the worker, ruining small proprietors and creating an army of unemployed.”
“We are all different, but when we ask for the Lord\'s blessings, we must not forget that God created us equal.”
“Boasting about wealth is an open invitation to others to divest you of it.”
“There are people who have money and people who are rich.”
“If we all did the things we are really capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.”
